message.content: {"given_definition_quality":60,"better_definition":"often; many times","sentence":"他常常去学校。","image_prompt":"A young man walking to a school building under a cloudy, bluish sky. The scene is animated in a soft apocalypse style: faded colors, softly crumbling walls, wild grass sprouting around, yet the atmosphere is calm. The character repeats the walk, suggesting he goes often.","sentence_translation":"He often goes to school."}
